scripts.build:js: browserify src/index.js -t browserify-css -t babelify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > src/build.js
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/index.js -t browserify-css -t babelify  -g livereactload --debug --verbose -o src/build.js
scripts.reload:js: npm run watch:js & livereactload monitor src/build.js & wait
scripts.dev: npm run reload:js & npm run reload:html
scripts.publish:pages: npm run lint --silent && npm run test --silent && npm run build --silent && gh-pages --dist src --src '+(build.js|index.html)'
